The Customer Data is used by downstream system and different ETLAPPS vendors. Customer data was remediated and loaded by DIH which was propagated to the ETL_APP vendors in the form of flat files.

The major Development task undertaken by me for this Enhancement involved developing SQL         Scripts, introducing several mapping to maintain and validate the functionality of the workflows. 3. Project Description

Title: ETL Performance Tuning
Client: World's leading biotechnology organisation


Overview: There were number of ETL’s which took around 10-12 hours in completing due to which number of user’s experienced missing data in oracle table. Post completion of Tuning, the ETL running time reduced from 10-12 hours to 7-10 minutes resulting in user able to access the data within the Allocated time.

The Major Development task undertaken by me for this project was to identify the bottleneck in the ETL process leading to delay. Bottleneck Identified in the ETL sub process and provided the resolution. The serial processing which use to take place resulting in delay was changed to parallel processing resulting in only one iteration.

Performance driven professional with more than 3.7 years of experience in developing and

distributing them in various media and social platforms and measuring its impact and effectiveness.  

 
Key Responsibilities: 
 

• Conceptualise, design and execute digital campaigns for better ROI within the budget assigned 
by the client and within the stipulated time frame. 

• Managing all paid campaigns on Google, Bing, Facebook, LinkedIn, YouTube as well as other 
search and display marketing engines. 

• Interacting with different internal teams like Content Writer, Copy Writer, Designer, etc. with 
respect to the Digital Campaigns. 

 

• Sr. PPC Executive at Technians Softech Pvt Ltd, Gurgaon from April 2017 – March 2019 
 
Responsible for managing Hitachi Systems, Marvel Tea, Beltecno India, Eye Level, ALS IAS, Wealth Fund, 
Purpleark, Ace Cloud hosting & many company’s PPC campaigns, including client servicing.  

 
Key Responsibilities: 

 
• Handling roles ranging from project management & delivery, and account management 

 
• Understanding client business and requirements. Formulating strategies and road map 

for successful delivery of PPC campaigns 
 

• Working closely with SEO & Social Media teams to ensure knowledge sharing and co-
optimization 

 
• Digital Marketing Executive at International Virtual Technology & Research Pvt Ltd, Gurgaon from 

Feb 2016 – Feb 2017 
 

Key Responsibilities: 
 

• Digital Analytics & Reporting  
• Formulation PPC strategies to meet client’s marketing objectives  
• Managing various aspects of Account Management and Client Servicing  

 
EDUCATIONAL QUALIFICATION  
 

• Bachelor of Technology(CSE) from USIT, GGSIP University, Delhi with first division 
 

• Xth & XIIth from Navin Bharti Public School, New Delhi, CBSE Board, with first division
